fullText:
The best content on X is neither short form nor long form. Itâ€™s medium form: 1-2 paragraphs. 

Itâ€™s just short enough to hook someone and explain something interesting. But itâ€™s not too long that people leave before reacting to it.

Basically, this exact post.
